sentences.sContent: Mr. Hall is non-committal about the number of jobs that the development corporation has created.
sentences.sCn: 霍尔先生对开发公司已创造的岗位数量含糊其词。
西尔维娅的脸显得不置可否。
...一个不疼不痒、不明不白的答复。

remMethod.val: non(不) + committal(承担义务) → 不承担义务的

trans.tranCn: 态度暧昧的； 不承担义务的
trans.tranOther: You can describe someone as noncommittal when they deliberately do not express their opinion or intentions clearly
